Quick Start Guide

1 Add to Your Repository

Create a new file .github/workflows/releasepilot.yml

2 Copy This Configuration
name: ReleasePilot
on:
  pull_request:
    types: [opened, synchronize]
  push:
    branches: [main]

jobs:
  release:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v3
      - uses: geppix140269/release-pilot@v1
        with:
          github_token: ${{ secrets.GITHUB_TOKEN }}
          openai_api_key: ${{ secrets.OPENAI_API_KEY }}
3 Add Your API Keys

Go to Settings → Secrets → Actions and add your OpenAI or Anthropic API key

4 Push and Watch the Magic!

ReleasePilot will automatically handle your releases, changelogs, and deployments
